title: Calories in 93/7 Ground Beef
meta_description: Discover calories in 93 7 ground beef per 100 g, including protein, fat, carbs, and full nutrition breakdown for this lean option.
assumptions: 93% lean, 7% fat ground beef, formed into patty, cooked (broiled), drained of fat; no added seasonings or oils.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, exact fat content, cooking method, and portion size. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 100 g of cooked 93/7 ground beef provides ~179 kcal and ~26 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Pan-fried with 1 tsp oil per 100 g

faqs.q: How many calories in 100 g of 93/7 ground beef?
faqs.a: About 179 kcal when cooked and drained.

faqs.q: What is the protein content in 93 7 ground beef?
faqs.a: Approximately 26.4 g protein per 100 g cooked.
No carbs, fiber, or sugarsâ€”it's nearly all protein and fat.

faqs.q: How does cooking affect calories in 93 7 ground beef?
faqs.a: Cooking concentrates nutrients; raw is lower per 100 g due to water content.
It has 93% lean meat and only 7% fat, lower than 80/20 varieties.
